dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: So, um, are we, like, completely suffocating teenagers now, or what? Should parents have to approve everything their kid does on Instagram?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, um, are we, like, completely suffocating teenagers now, or what? Should parents have to approve everything their kid does on Instagram?

dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! I mean, honestly, parental permission just to go live? That's, um, a huge step.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! I mean, honestly, parental permission just to go live? That's, um, a huge step.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Now users under 16 will not be able to go live without parental permission.

dialogue_turns.text: A huge step! And like, not being able to turn off the automatic blurring of, uh, potentially nude images in messages without adult approval? That’s wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A huge step! And like, not being able to turn off the automatic blurring of, uh, potentially nude images in messages without adult approval? That's wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, if a teenager wants to turn off the function that automatically blurs images with possible nudity in messages, he will also need adult approval.

dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! It's like, Mark Zuckerberg and Meta are really trying to, you know, control the narrative here.

dialogue_turns.text: Totally. All this pressure, right? Like, remember all the criticism about social media and kids?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. All this pressure, right? Like, remember all the criticism about social media and kids?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The company took this step after more and more people began to criticize social networks for their negative impact on teenagers.

dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh. So now for users under 16, it’s, um, a whole new world.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! All part of this updated teen account system. They’ve already moved, like, 54 million teens to these special accounts worldwide.

dialogue_turns.text: I don't know, though. They're trying to, like, answer all the people who said these platforms had a negative impact.
